name: Palestine
currentCrisisSummary:
Occupied Palestine, especially Gaza, endures an intensifying catastrophe inflicted by **Israeli settler colonialism** and **occupation**. This includes mass displacement, widespread civilian death, systematic destruction of public services, and crisis levels of **starvation and disease deliberately induced** through siege and bombardment.

The **ICJ** found claims of **genocide in Gaza plausible**; **accountability** efforts continue at the **ICC**. This extreme violence and **structural deprivation** are enabled by unwavering military, economic, and diplomatic support from **Western powers**, particularly the US, shielding Israel from consequences.

These dynamics represent the current phase of a century-long process of **settler colonialism**, **ethnic cleansing** (*Nakba*), and **apartheid** designed to dispossess Palestinians and deny self-determination.

imperialRoot.legacy:
The crisis is rooted in policies enacted under the **British Mandate**. The 1917 **Balfour Declaration** endorsed a 'national home for the Jewish people' while promising to protect non-Jewish communities â€” a contradiction Britain didn't resolve.

Mandate policies facilitated **Zionist settlement** and undermined indigenous Arab rights. Britain's suppression of Palestinian movements and its 1948 withdrawal preceded the war and the ***Nakba***, during which 700k-750k Palestinians became refugees.

The refugee crisis, **dispossession**, and **Mandate precedents** inform today's structures of **occupation** and exclusion.

historicalContext.title: Geopolitical Involvement
historicalContext.description:
**Western states** â€” especially the **United States** â€” provide sustained **military aid**, **arms transfers**, and **diplomatic protection**, allowing Israeli **occupation** and **expansionist policies** to continue with impunity. This **strategic alignment** reinforces the power imbalance.

**Defence industries** benefit, and states gain a regional ally.

historicalContext.title: Settler Colonialism and Apartheid
historicalContext.description:
The conflict is fundamentally **settler colonialism**: policies of **land expropriation**, **settlement expansion**, **movement restrictions**, and **disenfranchisement** producing permanent **colonial structures**. Human rights organisations find Israeli measures meet the threshold of **apartheid**.

This system is also economic/spatial: **land seizures**, **settler infrastructure**, **discriminatory resource allocation** create **structural dependency**.

historicalContext.title: The Oslo Accords and Neoliberal Subjugation
historicalContext.description: The 1993 **Oslo Accords**, rather than leading to sovereignty, created a framework for **economic and political subjugation** under a **neoliberal guise**. The 1994 **Paris Protocol** locked the Palestinian economy into **dependency** on Israel. This '**economic peace**' created the **Palestinian Authority (PA)**, reliant on foreign aid, whose security forces often coordinate with the **occupation**, while **settlement expansion** accelerated.

historicalContext.title: International Law And Accountability
historicalContext.description: Post-Oct 2023, legal processes activated. The **ICJ** case found **plausible genocide** allegations. The **ICC** investigates **war crimes**. These mechanisms face political contestation but represent formal **accountability** avenues.

humanitarianImpact.title: Casualties
humanitarianImpact.description: Estimated 67,000+ killed in Gaza since Oct 2023 by **Israeli military assaults**, part of a **plausible genocide**.

humanitarianImpact.title: Affected Population
humanitarianImpact.description: Gaza's entire population (2.3M) faces **catastrophe deliberately inflicted through bombardment and siege.**

humanitarianImpact.title: Food Insecurity
humanitarianImpact.description: Entire Gaza population suffers crisis-level hunger (over 1M catastrophic), **engineered through Israel's blockade and destruction of food systems.**

humanitarianImpact.title: Displacement
humanitarianImpact.description: Over 1.9M internally displaced in Gaza (nearly 90%) by **Israeli military operations constituting ethnic cleansing.**

humanitarianImpact.title: Refugees
humanitarianImpact.description: 5.9M registered Palestinian refugees denied **right of return**, reliant on UNRWA â€“ direct legacy of the **1948 *Nakba* (ethnic cleansing).**

humanitarianImpact.title: Healthcare Collapse
humanitarianImpact.description: Gaza's healthcare system **systematically dismantled by Israeli attacks.**

humanitarianImpact.title: Lack of Water Access
humanitarianImpact.description: Over 95% of Gaza's water unfit due to **Israeli infrastructural destruction and restrictions.**

humanitarianImpact.title: Education Denied
humanitarianImpact.description: Over 625,000 children in Gaza denied education by **Israeli bombardment destroying schools.**

timeline.event: **First Zionist Congress**: Held in Basel, Switzerland, the congress formally establishes the political Zionist movement. Its goal is to create a Jewish state in Palestine, a project which involved the displacement of the indigenous Palestinian population.
**Balfour Declaration**: Britain issues the Balfour Declaration, promising support for a 'national home for the Jewish people' in Palestine, disregarding the indigenous Arab population.
**The Nakba ('Catastrophe')**: Over 750,000 Palestinians were expelled or fled from their homes and land during the 1948 war, as Zionist militias established the state of Israel.
**The Naksa ('Setback')**: Israel occupies the West Bank, Gaza Strip, and East Jerusalem in the Six-Day War, imposing a military rule that continues to this day.

**Oslo Accords**: A US-led 'peace process' creates the Palestinian Authority. Its economic protocols lock Palestinians into dependency on Israel, providing cover for accelerated land theft and the expansion of illegal settlements under the guise of negotiations.
**Gaza Blockade**: Israel imposes a land, air, and sea blockade on the Gaza Strip, which the UN has described as illegal 'collective punishment'.
**Great March of Return**: Mass civilian protests in Gaza demanding the right of return are met with lethal force by Israeli forces, killing hundreds and wounding tens of thousands.

**October 7th**: After 16 years of an Israeli blockade, Hamas leads an attack on Israel; Israel launches a massive assault on Gaza in response. The ICJ has since ruled that claims of genocide in Gaza are plausible.
**ICJ Plausible Genocide Ruling**: The ICJ rules that claims of genocide in Gaza are plausible, ordering provisional measures against Israel.

**Fragile Ceasefire**: A ceasefire is declared on October 10. The agreement is immediately tenuous, with human rights monitors reporting over 80 Israeli violations and at least 97 Palestinian deaths in Gaza within the first 10 days.

donate.description: A non-political, non-profit organisation that provides free medical care to injured and ill children who lack access to care within the local health system.
The primary emergency service provider in Palestine, operating ambulances and delivering life-saving medical care. Its medics and volunteers provide impartial aid on the front lines.
The primary UN agency providing essential services, including education, healthcare, and emergency aid, to millions of registered Palestinian refugees.
Provides urgent psychological first aid and support to children in Gaza who have survived bombings and witnessed horrific events.

WFP is on the ground in Gaza, delivering emergency food, hot meals, and nutritional support to hundreds of thousands of people. Their work is critical in fighting the catastrophic hunger crisis and preventing famine.

advocacy.title: Support BDS (Boycott, Divestment, Sanctions)
advocacy.description: Support the **Palestinian-led, non-violent BDS movement**. Modelled on the South African anti-apartheid movement, it pressures Israel to comply with international law by ending the occupation, granting full equality to Palestinian citizens, and honouring the right of return for refugees.

advocacy.title: End Military Aid and Arms Sales
advocacy.description: Advocate for an end to all **military aid and arms sales** to Israel that are used in violation of international law, particularly from Western enablers like the US and Germany.

advocacy.title: Demand Targeted Sanctions
advocacy.description: Demand **targeted sanctions** on Israeli officials and entities responsible for war crimes, **apartheid**, and the construction of **illegal settlements**.

advocacy.title: Support Legal Accountability
advocacy.description: Support the **genocide case against Israel at the ICJ** and **war crimes investigations at the ICC** to challenge state impunity.
